alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Florence (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:31PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Florence and southeastern Darlington Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 431 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Timmonsville, or 11 miles west of Florence, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Timmonsville, Quinby, Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus, Carolinas Hospital System, Mcleod Regional Medical Center, Carolinas Hospital System - Cedar Tower and Health South Rehabilitation Hospital. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 136 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 149 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
